description:
Japanese government negotiator Shindo Kojiro has been absorbed into a giant 2km long cube known as Kado.  Inside, he meets a being called Yaha-kui zaShunina, who seems to possess powers beyond humanity`s ability to comprehend.  Who is this being, and what are his plans for humanity?  Shindo agrees to become this creature`s representative as it begins its negotiations with the Japanese government.
Source: crunchyroll
